commands.cmd: if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm install; elif [ -d backend ] && [ -f backend/package.json ]; then cd backend && pnpm install; else echo 'ERROR: Cannot find package.json' && exit 1; fi

if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm prisma:generate; elif [ -d backend ] && [ -f backend/package.json ]; then cd backend && pnpm prisma:generate; else echo 'ERROR: Cannot find package.json for prisma generate' && exit 1; fi
if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm build; elif [ -d backend ] && [ -f backend/package.json ]; then cd backend && pnpm build; else echo 'ERROR: Cannot find package.json for build' && exit 1; fi
